Articles.Content:
During a launch the game froze right after seperating boosters.

Output log Link

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/mq3846fqq1sjga6/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/mq3846fqq1sjga6/output_log.txt?dl=0)

System specs:

Win 7 64 bit

Mem 8 GB

CPU Intel i7-2860

GPU NVIDIA GT 555M

Craft file used for launch:

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/e1yuiu3p39uvc7p/Aardvark%20II.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/e1yuiu3p39uvc7p/Aardvark%20II.craft?dl=0)
